author: Special Correspondent
text:
The carcass of a shark that got caught in a fishing net off the coast of Kottucherimedu village in Karaikal district.

A small shark got trapped in fishing net on Saturday and was brought to the shores.

Weighing about 400 kg, it was seven-foot long.

It got trapped in the net of Sivaraman, a fisherman of Kottucherimedu village, who ventured into sea by his motor-boat on Friday.

A large number of fishermen and villagers came to the marketing yard and had a glimpse of it.
title: Fisherman nets a shark
